Comment: The response effectively analyzes Acts 9:13-16 and Galatians 2:16 in relation to the apostolic mission to Gentiles, emphasizing the theological significance of faith in Jesus for justification. It aptly addresses the concern of exploring scriptural teachings on grace and inclusion, showcasing a solid understanding of how these passages demonstrate the inclusive nature of the Christian faith. The integration of relevant passages and theological insights from a Christian worldview is well articulated. Great job!
